pullrequest.title: Proposal for custom elements and attributes

content.raw: Thanks a lot for working on this, this would be really helpful for parsing `sdf` files from non-Gazebo software. It would be great if it could be progressively used also for the most Gazebo-specific parts of SDF, see  [https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issues/93/change-the-sdf-spec-to-make-less-gazebo](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issues/93/change-the-sdf-spec-to-make-less-gazebo) . Once the proposal get merged and implemented, it probably could make sense to keep an “Extension Registry”, i.e.  a documentation page linking public available extensions, something like the [glTF Extension Registry](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/tree/master/extensions) or the [COLLADA Extension Registry](https://www.khronos.org/collada/wiki/How_to_create_a_COLLADA_Extension#Extension_Registry).
